column1: Local Foods////ONE OF THE BEST sandwiches I've ever had. Crunchy Chicken. I asked the man at the cashier (wish I got his name) to make me a 2nd sandwich so I could take it home to San Francisco
column2: so my girlfriend could try it. He tells me that he will deconstruct it. He then tells me that he separated all eleven ingredients and placed them in a to go container so I can construct this sandwich after I fly home to San Francisco. After
column3: he gives me a receipt with the ingredients listed and hand drawn pictures of each ingredient! Talk about customer service! This man deserves a raise!!
